review: This thing can pretty much access all your purchases in the cloud (except apps), and stream them to it (while only storing the data until no longer needed)! The perfect Apple iCloud companion for those who are needy for space on their PC, Mac, or iDevice! It can even do a lot more things than just access your iCloud content. It can share audio with Apple Home Sharing linked devices through the AirPlay service (requires Wi-Fi, and Ethernet devices must have a direct connection through the router), and it can access basic and premium services (like YouTube, Netflix, Hulu Plus, The Weather Channel, and more)! However, the only thing I wish it had was the ability to stream Live TV through your Local Cable or Satellite TV provider (or even a DTV antenna), just one of your choice! Hopefully, the next generation will have these extremely useful features, and more! If they do so, I literally will stop at nothing just to trade it in for credit towards the next generation! But..., only the company that offers the highest Trade-In value will earn the right for the future exchange! So (for example) if Amazon can't beat Apple's offer, they may lose out on the action!For right now, this product simply delivers what I need it for at this time, and I'm not regretting this purchase..., at all!Apple launches new devices faster than any other competitor, so please try to wait for the next generation before you buy!But..., if this is all you want, then I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who wants it exactly for this purpose!
